posts.post_title: old judge "ad card" ??      JOS R. ROYER confectioner
posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott brockelman
I have a couple of odd ball pieces for sale.

1. what looks like an N172 but a bit smaller and a bit different looking, it has an on the back for JOS. R. ROYER confectioner. There have been a few of these turn up along with a few other issues with the back stamp. Let me be clear it is not a genuine N172, however no one knows exactly when these were made, perhaps early in the 20th century or much later. I am selling it as a novelty piece $49

2. mayo cut plug metal tobacco tag, pretty nice for one of these SOLD
